title: LFM ranked 5's goal of gold 5 or higher
body: Group of 4 friends looking for one more player to join us, We typically play 4-5 times a week at night from around 6.30, we use skype and are semi serious about making it to gold as a team so we dont have to play solo queue prefer mid or adc's but can fit around any role age 18+

replies.body:
Been playing solo q forever so looking to join up with a team. main as support, mid after that. Was Plat 4 last season.
Have been mainly looking for a team to compete with in Armageddon Expo Tournament if you guys are in Hamilton.
IGN: EpicLoLer
Il join add me IGN - FatLip play jungle but can play all roles real good and experienced at adc.
